title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 3663 and H.R. 4910 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Veterans	

Issued on:
June 15, 2018
On Friday, June 15, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 3663, which designates the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Huntington, West Virginia, as the Hershel “Woody” Williams VA Medical Center; andH.R. 4910, the “Veterans Cemetery Benefit Correction Act,” which requires the National Park Service to furnish outer burial receptacles for veterans and service members buried in national cemeteries it manages.
